text: Korah tama daane a Izhar, tangada o di madahaanau o Kohath, i di madawaawa Levi, gu hai baahi gi di dagi o Moses. Mee gu hagapuni anga ginai digau dogodolu o di madawaawa Reuben, ala go Dathan mo Abiram, nia dama daane a Eliab, mo On tama daane a Peleth, mo digau Israel e lua lau madalima (250), nia dagi ne hilihili go nia daangada o di guongo.16.1-2 Jude 11
